holidays.name: World Development Information Day
holidays.description: A day dedicated to promoting awareness and mobilizing public opinion on development problems and the necessity of strengthening international cooperation to solve them.
holidays.origin: Established by the United Nations General Assembly in 1972 to draw attention to development issues globally.
holidays.funFact: Despite its serious intent, many confuse this day for a celebration of tech development rather than global development issues!
